name: Baston!
description:
Controls Menu :
  • Xbox Start / Return -> Makes you ready for fighting !
  • Xbox Select / Left CTRL -> Change selection for customization
  • Xbox Left & Right / (A or Q) & D -> Change custom Face/Skin/Weapon/Map/BO
Ingame :
  • Xbox Left Joystick / WASD or ZQSD -> Move
  • Xbox LT / RT / Space -> Dash
  • Xbox X / Left Arrow -> Slash on left side
  • Xbox B / Right Arrow -> Slash on right side
  • Xbox Y / Up Arrow -> Thrust/Hit in front of you
  • Xbox LB / (Q or A) -> Block on left side
  • Xbox RB / E -> Block on right side
Details

Baston! (It means Fight! in french ;) )

This is a local multiplayer fighting game.

You can choose a weapon, a skin, a face to customize your player !

You can choose between BestOf 1, 3, or 5 rounds.

And you in 3 very different maps !
